nas_se_control-checkbox.body:
<label nz-checkbox [(ngModel)]="i.${1:name}" name="${1}">${2|启用,禁止,允许,不允许|}</label>
$0
nas_se_control-checkbox.description: SE Control Checkbox (编辑控件：多选框)

nas_se_control-date.description: SE Control Date (编辑控件：日期)

nas_se_control-input-group.body:
<nz-input-group nzAddOnAfter="${2:后置标签}">
  <input type="text" nz-input [(ngModel)]="i.${1:name}" name="${1}">
</nz-input-group>
$0
nas_se_control-input-group.description: SE Control Input group (编辑控件：文本框组合)

nas_se_control-input.description: SE Control Input (编辑控件：文本框)

nas_se_control-number.description: SE Control Input number (编辑控件：数字框)

nas_se_control-radio-group.description: SE Control Radio group (编辑控件：单选框组)

nas_se_control-select.description: SE Control Select (编辑控件：选择器)

nas_se_control-switch.description: SE Control Switch (编辑控件：开关)

nas_se_control-textarea.description: SE Control Textarea (编辑控件：多行文本框)

nas_se_control-time.description: SE Control Time (编辑控件：时间)

nas_se_controlClass.description: Class names of se control (编辑属性：控件区域样式名)

nas_se_form.body:
<form nz-form #f="ngForm" se-container>
  <se label="$2">
    $0
  </se>
  <se>
    <button nz-button nzType="primary" [disabled]="f.invalid">${1:保存}</button>
  </se>
</form>
nas_se_form.description: Form demo for se (编辑：表单示例)

nas_se_full.body:
<se label="${1:名称}"${2: required} error="${3:请填写}" optional="${4:(选填)}" optionalHelp="$5" extra="$6">
  $0
</se>
nas_se_full.description: full for se (编辑完整示例)

nas_se_help-html.description: Help html for se (编辑：HTML帮助)

nas_se_modal.body:
$1
$0
nas_se_modal.description: Modal demo for se (编辑：模态框示例)

nas_se_page.body:
<form nz-form #f="ngForm" (ngSubmit)="${1:save}()">
  <nz-card se-container="${2|1,2,3,4,5,6|}" gutter="24">
    $0
  </nz-card>
  <footer-toolbar errorCollect>
    <button nz-button nzType="primary" [disabled]="f.invalid" [nzLoading]="http.loading">${3:保存}</button>
  </footer-toolbar>
</form>
nas_se_page.description: Page demo using se (编辑：页面示例)

nas_se_search.body:
<form nz-form nzLayout="inline" (ngSubmit)="${1:save}()" se-container>
  <se label="${2:名称}">
    <input nz-input [(ngModel)]="i.${3:name}" name="${3}">
  </se>
  <se>
    <button nz-button nzType="primary">${4:搜索}</button>
  </se>
</form>
nas_se_search.description: Search demo for se (编辑：搜索示例)

nas_sf_edit.description: Edit demo for sf (动态表单：编辑模式)

nas_sf_modal.description: Modal demo for sf (动态表单：模态页示例)

nas_sf_page.body:
<sf #sf mode="edit" [schema]="schema" [ui]="ui" [formData]="$1" button="none">
  <footer-toolbar>
    <button nz-button type="submit" nzType="primary" (click)="save(sf.value)" [disabled]="!sf.valid" [nzLoading]="http.loading">保存</button>
  </footer-toolbar>
</sf>
nas_sf_page.description: Page dem for sf (动态表单：页面示例)

nas_sf_search.description: Search demo for sf (动态表单：搜索模式)

nas_st_custom.description: Custom row for st (表格：自定义列)

nas_st_res.description: res paraments for st (表格属性：res 参数)

nas_sv_currency.body:
<sv label="${1|单价,金额,订单金额,支付金额,市场价|}">{{ ${2:i.price} | _currency }}</sv>
$0
nas_sv_currency.description: Currency demo for sv (查看：货币示例)

nas_sv_item-custom-title.description: Custom title for sv (查看：自定义标签标题)

nas_sv_item.body:
<sv label="${1|编号,名称,电话,手机,地址,备注,数量|}">$2</sv>
$0

nas_sv_label-width.description: Fix label width for sv (查看：固定标签宽度)

nas_sv_status.body:
<sv label="状态">
  <nz-badge *ngIf="i.status === 1" nzStatus="default" nzText="未提交"></nz-badge>
  <nz-badge *ngIf="i.status === 2" nzStatus="processing" nzText="运行中"></nz-badge>
  <nz-badge *ngIf="i.status === 4" nzStatus="warning" nzText="上线审核中"></nz-badge>
  <nz-badge *ngIf="i.status === 6" nzStatus="error" nzText="已删除"></nz-badge>
  $0
</sv>
nas_sv_status.description: Status demo for sv (查看：状态示例)

nas_sv_time.body:
<sv label="${1|时间,开始时间,结束时间,生效时间,创建时间,更新时间|}">{{ ${2:i.time} | _date }}</sv>
$0
nas_sv_time.description: Time demo for sv (查看：时间示例)

nas_sv_type.body:
<sv label="${1|失败,取消,重写,过期,警告,原因|}" type="${2|primary,success,danger,warning|}">$3</sv>
$0
nas_sv_type.description: Type demo for sv (查看属性：列表内容样式)
